meta.title: From CODE to NAMES
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: If you like Raddle, you'll also enjoy [Codenames](https://www.codenamesgame.com/), which is a staple of board game nights in our house. You're trying to get your teammates to pick certain words out of a grid, by using only a one-word clue. It's endlessly replayable, given the randomness of the setup each time. If you already have Codenames and want something similar, we also love [Decrypto](https://www.hachetteboardgames.com/products/decrypto).
